turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can order some coffee for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks the one on Mickley Avenue in Dallas, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want want a caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: short.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any whipped cream or add ons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get extra whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a short caffe mocha with almond milk, extra whipped cream from the starbucks on Mickanny avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. You, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you! Bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
